name: Secret Balls 3D
description: Secret Balls 3D is a simple and easy to get started physics-based game! What you need to do in this game is to collect the balls as more as possible. The more the better, and full score will be archived. Here you need to enable or disable the mechanisms in the level, or active them in different orders, or something else... (You may want to discover it by yourself) So, let enjoy it!
